Detailed Description

Class FfsMimeTypeMap provides static methods for getting MIME type table information based on the type of a flash file and vice versa.

See also:
MimeTypeTable

Member Function Documentation

FfsFileType FfsMimeTypeMap::GetFileTypeByMimeType (  MimeType  mime_type,
UINT8  offset = 0
)  [static]
 

More than one filetype can be registered for a particular MIME type. E.g. c_mime_audio_mpeg FfsFileTypeMp3 c_mime_audio_mpeg FfsFileTypeMpga If the order of the filetypes is known, the offset can be used to choose a particular filetype. In the example above GetFileTypeByMimeType(c_mime_audio_mpeg, 1) would return FfsFileTypeMpga.
